column5: I was thinking of heading up to the karwarthas for some crappie fishing but do you think im wasting my time with the rain that were suppose to get. thanks
Fishing is never a waste of time!!!  Sitting here wondering if you should go is though.....lol.  I say go for it!!  Sinker
yeah your right sinker, a little rain doesnt hurt lol
It's not a cold front so I don't think the rain should be a problem as temperatures should be warmer then we have been having.
As long as you don't mind getting wet I think your golden.  Can't wait to see some pics!  Cheers FF
If I can convince my little guy to sit in the rain for a while, I think we might go for a boat ride as well.  Sinker
I'll be on Stoney with two dogs in an old Ranger.
